problems.title: Does this sound familiar?
problems.subtitle: These situations occur every day in veterinary clinics.

night_emergencies.title: Missed night emergencies
night_emergencies.description: An owner writes at 11 PM. If you're not there, someone else takes care of it.

overwhelmed_reception.title: Overwhelmed reception
overwhelmed_reception.description: Your team handles queries... Each interruption adds up minutes.

missed_appointments.title: Missed appointments
missed_appointments.description: You take 2 hours to respond... Customer lost.

manual_reminders.title: Manual reminders
manual_reminders.description: Everything requires calls... depends on memory.

solution.title: Intelligent Care System
solution.description: ClinvetIA doesn't just respond. It understands the context, verifies your availability and closes the appointment without anyone intervening.

understand.title: Understands veterinary consultations
understand.description: Interprets symptoms, age, breed and context

solution.stat: of consultations arrive after hours. ClinvetIA attends to them

mock.example: “Hi, Toby hasn't wanted to eat since yesterday and I notice his belly is very swollen and hard to the touch. I'm worried.”
mock.triage_val: Symptoms of abdominal pain and anorexia. Possible obstruction. Priority: High.
mock.agenda_val: Emergency slot with Dr. García at 4:30 PM. Does that work for you?
mock.confirm: ✓ Appointment confirmed for 4:30 PM. Toby is already on the agenda!

hero.description: Attends pet consultations with veterinary criteria, classifies emergencies and schedules appointments without friction.

concept.highlight: attends owner inquiries about their pets in natural language
concept.warning: Every unanswered consultation is a customer who goes to another clinic.

features_section.description: Automates customer service while maintaining control and veterinary quality.

chat.title: Intelligent Consultation
chat.description: Responds to questions about symptoms, vaccines and 24/7 availability in natural language.

triage.title: Emergency Triage
triage.description: Differentiates symptoms, accidents and emergencies from routine inquiries.

data.title: Data Collection
data.description: Collects key information: pet, symptoms, history and availability.

booking.title: Appointment Proposal
booking.description: Suggests the correct appointment type: emergency, vaccination, surgery or check-up.

reminders.title: Automatic Reminders
reminders.description: Sends reminders via WhatsApp or email to reduce no-shows.

flow_section.title: Frictionless flow
flow_section.description: From owner inquiry to confirmed appointment, without manual intervention.

step1.title: Owner consultation
step1.description: The owner contacts via WhatsApp or web with their doubt or need.

step2.title: AI Classification
step2.description: ClinvetIA analyzes the message and classifies: emergency, symptomatology or general consultation.

step3.title: Appointment proposal
step3.description: The system proposes the most suitable appointment based on availability and type of care.

step4.title: Confirmation
step4.description: The owner confirms and the appointment is automatically registered in the system.

items.item1: Identifies serious symptoms and refers emergencies
items.item2: Does not diagnose: guides and proposes appointment

hero.subtitle: A clear flow to attend pet inquiries, classify emergencies and schedule appointments without overloading the team.

step1.title: Attend and classify
step1.text: Responds to pet inquiries, identifies if it's an emergency or routine, and maintains a professional veterinary tone.

step2.title: Collect key information
step2.text: Asks the essentials: symptoms, pet (species, age), vaccination history, and owner availability.

step3.title: Propose veterinary appointment
step3.text: Suggests emergency, vaccination, check-up or surgery appointments as appropriate, always with confirmation.

step4.title: Confirm and remind
step4.text: Sends confirmation with details (fasting if applicable, what to bring) and schedules a reminder 24h before.

data_section.title: What information it collects and why
data_section.subtitle: Only what's necessary to properly care for the pet and optimize your clinic's agenda.

symptoms.title: Symptoms and reason
symptoms.text: To classify emergency (vomiting, accidents) vs. routine (vaccines, bath).

pet_data.title: Pet data
pet_data.text: Species, breed, age, weight, known allergies and vaccination history.

availability.title: Owner availability
availability.text: To propose schedules compatible with the consultation type.

confirmations.title: Previous confirmations
confirmations.text: Fasting, current medication, pet behavior before scheduling surgery.

control_section.title: Control and supervision

items.0: The veterinarian decides which cases to review and when to intervene directly.
items.1: Serious symptoms or complex cases are referred immediately.
items.2: The system does not diagnose: it guides the owner and schedules with the professional.
items.3: The tone adapts to worried owners, with empathy and professionalism.

control_section.notice_text: Every unanswered consultation is a customer who goes to another clinic.

0.a: No. The system collects symptoms, classifies emergencies and schedules an appointment with the vet. It does not replace professional diagnosis.

1.a: Serious emergencies are prioritized and referred immediately. The system identifies critical symptoms and proposes an urgent appointment or refers to 24h care.

2.q: Does it adapt to my clinic's protocol?
2.a: Yes. You define your triage protocol, key questions by consultation type (emergency, vaccine, surgery) and communication tone.

3.q: Does it work for vaccine reminders?
3.a: Yes. It sends automatic reminders based on each pet's vaccination and deworming schedule.

4.a: Yes. You have complete visibility and can intervene at any time, especially in sensitive cases.

5.q: Is it suitable for small clinics?
5.a: Yes. It is designed for independent vets where every consultation counts and the team is overwhelmed.

cta.title: Does your clinic experience any of these situations?
cta.description: Discover how ClinvetIA can transform your clinic's care.

hero.subtitle: The system adapts to the rhythm of your veterinary clinic.

midnight_emergency.title: Midnight emergency
midnight_emergency.subtitle: Vomiting and lethargy
midnight_emergency.description: A worried owner writes at 2 AM because their dog won't stop vomiting.
midnight_emergency.mensaje: "My dog has been vomiting all night, what should I do?"
midnight_emergency.sistema: The system detects the emergency, asks key questions and schedules a priority appointment.
midnight_emergency.resultado: The dog is attended first thing in the morning, avoiding complications.

post_op.title: Post-operative
post_op.subtitle: Surgery follow-up
post_op.description: After surgery, the system sends reminders for medication and follow-up.
post_op.sistema: Sends medication reminders and schedules the post-operative review.
post_op.resultado: Successful recovery and the owner feels accompanied.

chronic_disease.title: Chronic disease
chronic_disease.subtitle: Diabetes control
chronic_disease.description: A diabetic cat needs periodic glucose checks.
chronic_disease.mensaje: "I forgot this month's appointment for Tico's control."
chronic_disease.sistema: Schedules the control appointment and sends automatic reminders.
chronic_disease.resultado: Rigorous control of the disease and improved quality of life.

vaccination.title: Vaccination
vaccination.subtitle: Vaccine reminder
vaccination.description: The system notifies that a puppy is due for its next vaccine dose.
vaccination.mensaje: "I didn't remember! When can we go?"
vaccination.sistema: Sends a reminder and offers several appointment options for vaccination.
vaccination.resultado: The puppy completes its vaccination schedule on time.

early_detection.title: Preventive Consultation
early_detection.subtitle: Early Detection
early_detection.description: In an annual check-up, a lump is detected and an ultrasound is recommended.
early_detection.mensaje: "I noticed a small lump on the dog, should I be worried?"
early_detection.sistema: Schedules a consultation for evaluation and possible ultrasound.

multi_service.title: Multiple Services
multi_service.subtitle: Grooming and Consultation
multi_service.description: A customer schedules grooming, and the system detects that a vaccine is due soon.
multi_service.sistema: Offers to add the vaccination in the same visit.
multi_service.resultado: Time saving for the customer and more complete service.

proactive_comm.title: Results Analysis
proactive_comm.subtitle: Proactive Communication
proactive_comm.description: The results of an analysis arrive, and the system notifies the owner.
proactive_comm.sistema: Notifies the owner and schedules a call to explain the results.
proactive_comm.resultado: Informed and calm owner, without needing to call the clinic.

new_puppy.title: First Visit
new_puppy.subtitle: New Puppy
new_puppy.description: A new customer asks about their puppy's first visit.
new_puppy.mensaje: "We have adopted a puppy, when do we have to go?"
new_puppy.sistema: Guides on the first visit, vaccines and schedules the appointment.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.description: Total transparency about the technology we use to make our website work.

0.title: What are Cookies?
0.content: Cookies are small text files that websites store on your device to remember your preferences and offer you a smoother navigation.

reset_requested.title: Session closed
reset_requested.description: A password reset was requested. Login when you have confirmed the change.

reset_confirmed.title: Change confirmed
reset_confirmed.description: The password has been updated. You can now login with the new password.

confirm_action.title: Confirm request
confirm_action.subtitle: Confirm the request to activate the user or apply the password change.

messages.invite_success: User activated successfully. You can now log in with the credentials received.
messages.error_invalid_token: This link is no longer valid. Request a new confirmation email.
messages.error_already_used: This email has already been used or is no longer valid. If you requested a new change, use the latest email received.
messages.error_expired: This email has expired. Request a new confirmation link.

exit_intent.title: Before you go, a detail
exit_intent.description: If you complete the calculator, we can give you a much better experience and a more precise evaluation of your clinic. It's fast and worth it.
exit_intent.quote: This way we ensure that you receive recommendations tailored to your real data.

cookie_consent.title: Cookie preferences
cookie_consent.description: We use necessary cookies for the operation of the site and optional ones to improve your experience.
cookie_consent.intro_text: You can accept all, reject them or customize your preferences.

runtime_text.k0158: Detailed information about how we protect and manage your personal data.
runtime_text.k0159: Details about our infrastructure security and protection measures.
runtime_text.k0160: Information about how we use cookies to improve your experience.
runtime_text.k0161: Legal terms and conditions for using the Clinvetia platform.
runtime_text.k0162: Full transparency about the technology we use to run our website.
runtime_text.k0163: Cookies are small text files websites store on your device to remember your preferences and provide smoother browsing.
runtime_text.k0164: These are essential for the website to work. They include session authentication, your theme preferences (Light/Dark), and selected language.
runtime_text.k0165: We use anonymous analytics cookies to understand how users interact with our platform, which helps us optimize speed and design.
runtime_text.k0166: You can configure your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the website may not function properly.
runtime_text.k0167: At Clinvetia, we take your clinic and patient data security very seriously.
runtime_text.k0168: We protect the core of your clinic with advanced security technology.
runtime_text.k0169: We implement enterprise-grade security measures, including end-to-end encryption and periodic audits, to keep patient information safe.
runtime_text.k0170: All communication between your clinic and our servers uses TLS 1.3 with bank-grade AES-256 encryption.
runtime_text.k0171: Our servers are hosted in ISO 27001-certified data centers with 24/7 physical security, ensuring 99.9% availability.
runtime_text.k0172: Our AI models are isolated per customer. One clinic's data is never used to answer another clinic's queries.
runtime_text.k0173: We perform automatic hourly backups. Your data is replicated across multiple geographic locations for disaster recovery.
runtime_text.k0174: If you detect any security issue, please report it immediately at security@clinvetia.com. We reward responsible disclosures.
runtime_text.k0175: Clinvetia never sells your data to third parties. We only share information with essential service providers (such as messaging services) under strict confidentiality agreements.
runtime_text.k0176: We govern the relationship between Clinvetia and your veterinary center to ensure the best service.
runtime_text.k0177: By accessing and using Clinvetia, you agree to comply with these terms of service. If you disagree with any part, you must not use the platform.
runtime_text.k0178: Clinvetia provides AI tools for veterinary management. You agree to use the service responsibly and professionally, always respecting veterinary medical criteria.
runtime_text.k0179: The AI system is a support tool. Final responsibility for diagnoses, treatments, and medical care always rests with the licensed veterinarian.
runtime_text.k0180: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Access will remain active until the end of the current billing period.
runtime_text.k0181: All Clinvetia software, algorithms, and designs are the company's exclusive property. A limited, non-transferable license is granted for the contract duration.
